resources.string: In order to use the functions of the software, this service needs to be enabled. This service does not access the network, so your data is completely safe and we have no means of learning what you are doing. We need those permissions just to parse the application layout.
The list is empty. Click the \"+\" button to create a new rule.
If you don\'t allow this notification to be displayed all the time, the service may be automatically terminated by the system.
The seeNot service failed to start, please go to the system accessibility settings to start it manually
The main switch is closed, the service will not work.
Some permissions are not granted or the program service is not running, please open it now.
When setting rules, floating windows are required.
All accessibility services rely on this permission.
Enter the page, please scroll down, find "seeNot service" and open it. If you can\'t find it, click \"Downloaded apps\".
Used to prevent the system from killing the service, and the battery life will not be significantly affected.
Unable to judge, please ensure by yourself

The functions of these setting items include normal startup, running in the background and not being forced to close due to the so-called "power saving" functionality. They are all necessary for the proper functioning of seeNot the app.
Used to send necessary notifications and prevent services from being killed.

Do not set it in the app or on the system desktop. Go to the app you want to set up and hit \"Refresh\" to get the correct app package name. If the acquisition is incorrect, please try to click on the blank space of the program interface or exit and re-enter, and then click \"Refresh\" again.
The corresponding program cannot be modified after the setting has been completed.
Some necessary information has not been set, or the input information does not meet the specifications
The rules cannot be set for the seeNot app itself and the system desktop (the "minus one screen" usually does not belong to the system desktop, and can be set)
When the switch is turned on, once you enter this application, you will exit directly.

This is where you set the Activity you want to be forced to jump out of, press \"Refresh\" to get the latest results. Note: Some software may combine multiple pages into one Activity. At this time, you can consider using \"find text\" or \"find element\" rules to trigger exit by virtue of the unique features on the page.
Click \"Select\" to open the text selection mode, select the desired text, and click \"OK\" to save. Note: some text in a small number of apps cannot be parsed.
Force back after finding the element
Click \"Select\" to open the element selection mode, and select the required element, click \"OK\" to save. Suitable for some pages that cannot find a suitable trigger text.
Auto. click after finding the element
Click \"Select\" to open the element selection mode, and select the element to be automatically clicked to obtain its element ID, click \"OK\" to save.
Auto. click after finding the text
Click \"Select\" to open the text selection mode, and select the text to be clicked automatically, click \"OK\" to save. Note: some text in a small number of apps cannot be parsed.
There is already a \"forbid access to the program\" rule, so new rules cannot be added
Click here to back up all the settings and rules of the application
Click here to export the single rule you want to backup or share
Click here to import all data of the application and overwrite the current data; to import a single rule, please click "Add Rule" on the homepage
Click the right button to set
Failed to open the settings panel, please check whether the accessibility service is turned on
Unable to get the current element
Unable to get the current text
After enabling, every time you enter seeNot software, you need to enter the password to continue
Leave the password box empty to disable parental control
A password is required to continue
The password is wrong, please try again
Set the timed opening and closing rules
How many days does the setting work?
Failed to create the floating window required for the seeNot service
Turn this rule off or on during this time

If you want to enable it only during this period, please choose to disable the rule on the homepage; similarly, if you only want to turn it off during this period, you need to choose to enable the rule on the homepage to take effect.
Swipe backwards after finding the text
Swipe backwards after finding the element

Click \"Select\" to open the text selection mode, and select the text that will swipe up and return as soon as you encounter it, and click \"OK\" to save. Note: some text in a small number of apps cannot be parsed.
Click \"Select\" to open the element selection mode, and select the relevant element that swipe up and return as soon as you encounter it to get its element ID, and click \"OK\" to save.
Set how many hours to reopen after

When enabled, closing the rules or closing the main switch will require a reservation to avoid impulsiveness, but the opening rules will not be affected; after the reservation time is up, unlimited settings can be made within 10 minutes
Enter 0 in the text box to disable the reservation-lock mode, and the number entered is the number of minutes that need to be reserved in advance
Input the text of a single rule exported in the setting interface to import a single rule that does not see you
Apps are becoming more and more bloated, but you can keep your life simple by using seeNot.
The next generation of screen time management solution is here.
Continuing to use means agreeing the
You must first obtain these permissions before you can use seeNot the app
No notification yet, or still loadingâ€¦
All data obtained by these permissions will only be processed locally and will not be uploaded, so your data is 100% safe
The current page has no helper message
This rule is about %s, so can only be edited when that app is on. If you are already in it, please re-click the app or scroll the list in the app, and then retry again
This id is used multiple times in the page, it may not be suitable as a judgment condition
This id is used multiple times on the page, it may not be possible to correctly determine which one should be clicked
This id is used multiple times on the page, which may cause misjudgment
Not allowed to set rules here
This action is not invertible, please delete it carefully.
The seeNot service is not enabled
Failed to return to the prev. page, exit the app directly:
The seeNot service may have been destroyed by the system mistakenly
Please go to system accessibility settings to reopen it!
Disclaimer: All rules are set by the user, seeNot itself does not provide, nor is it responsible for the user\'s rules and their consequences
Please select "Export" in the rule menu on the homepage to export.
Please go to %s/logs in the system file application to manually export the required logs.
Not finished setting yet, please try again
